mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ai_voice_sessions (user_id, title, model, mode, locale, scenario, pinned, deleted, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{model}, #{mode}, #{locale}, #{scenario}, 0, 0, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ai_voice_sessions WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId} AND deleted = 0 LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE ai_voice_sessions SET title = #{title}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId} AND deleted = 0
UPDATE ai_voice_sessions SET pinned = #{pinned}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId} AND deleted = 0
UPDATE ai_voice_sessions SET deleted = 1, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId} AND deleted = 0
